item.title: About
Hello, friend
item.description: “Hello, friend?” That’s lame. Maybe I should give you a name… But that’s a slippery slope. You’re only in my head. We have to remember that… Shit. It’s actually happened. I’m talking to an imaginary person. â€” Mr. Robot S01E01 This is the start of yet another developer blog. It’s been a long time coming as I have always wanted to have a blog but I have been postponing it.
